response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its immense value to you, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1100000}
